text: to the leaders of our nation here we are
again a country mourning another mass
shooting and like always you are quick
to send Las Vegas your thoughts and
prayers Melania and I are praying for
every American like after my dad Dave
Sanders was murdered at Columbine High
School we received a lot of thoughts and
prayers after my mom John Lafferty
hashbrown was killed in the Sandy Hook
school shooting in Connecticut or when I
was shot in Tucson Arizona at Gabrielle
Giffords town hall when my mother mrs.
Ethel and my two cousins Susie Jackson
and Towanda Sanders were shot and killed
in Charleston South Carolina
I want to thank all my colleagues in the
Senate and the house for their kind
words over the past week and for the
prayers after my son Christopher wash
Michaels Martinez was shot and killed in
Isla Vista California like after I was
shot at Virginia Tech where 32 people
died after my dad Damien mines was shot
and killed while at work in San
Bernardino California you sent me your
thoughts and prayers after our son Alex
teeth's was shot and killed in a movie
theater in Aurora Colorado and when our
son Jerry Wright was killed at the pulse
nightclub in Orlando along with 48 other
innocent people you sent us your
thoughts and prayers more than 90 people
per day died from homicide suicide
unintentional shootings and hundreds
more injured every day hey Mitch
McConnell hey Paul Ryan hey Donald Trump
I hope they will know that we're praying
for them now
senator Mitch McConnell after my dad was
killed you led 54 senators to vote
against a measure that would have
prevented people on the government
terrorist watchlist from buying guns
speaker Ryan in the 2016 election cycle
you received over a hundred and seventy
thousand dollars from pro-gun advocates
it's no wonder you refused to let the
house take up any vote on gun violence
prevention measures after my son was
shot and killed in what was one of the
worst mass shootings our country had
seen until now so why won't you at least
allow a vote on this on the floor of the
house well first I would tell you well
this is nothing more than a publicity
stunt how dare you say trying to save
lives like our sons was a stunt
president trunk the nra spent more than
30 million dollars supporting your
candidacy in 2016 and in April you told
them you came through for me and I am
going to come through for you if
Virginia Tech wasn't your wake-up call
then let Las Vegas be at the very least
start by requiring background checks on
all gun purchases to keep guns out of
dangerous hands that would not have
stopped Las Vegas I get that but it
might prevent the next one
[Music]
before more people died
[Music]
